sentence: regulatory tailoring and supervision and regulation report almost a year ago, congress passed the economic growth, regulatory relief, and consumer protection act (errcpa).3 a cornerstone of this legislation was a directive to the regulatory agencies to tailor oversight of institutions to ensure that our regulations match the character of the firms we regulate, with specific congressional direction for firms between $100 billion and $250 billion in total assets.
label: LABEL_2

sentence: board of governors of the federal reserve system, "statement regarding the impact of the economic growth, regulatory relief, and consumer protection act (egrrcpa)," (pdf) july 6, 2018.
